name: mazy
content:

like a maze (= a complicated system of paths in which you can easily get lost): The canals were mazy and unsigned, so she had to navigate by landmarks. She quickly got lost in the mazy corridors.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mazy confusion of streets filled with people and animals seemed to blur the senses.For those of us who have followed the star's mazy career path, it is difficult to believe that she has finally found a sense of calm.Several mazy runs promised a goal, but she was sometimes too slow to take the shots.
